title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
ind that if you succeed in breaking the contract and attempt to ask for a reward, he will only offer your life a reward and Raphael will soon make a reappearance and Yurgir will allow you to take anything he left behind.

Make a decision to move on to your next objective.

Await Raphael's next appearance.

We killed the orthon, as Raphael asked. Now we're waiting for him to reappear and fulfil his promise to Astarion - whenever and wherever that might happen.

If you followed through with Raphae
